description: Deals one slight hit to an enemy. Deals physical or magical damages depending on the weapon held.
deals 3 hits to all enemies, creating a huge tidal wave.
deals 5 hits to an enemy with a majestic blue dragon.
grants attack buff and heals the user by 10% of their max health.
deals 1 hit to all enemies with a light explosion.
deals 4 hits to all enemies with a quick attack, recovering the user’s hp by 30% of damage dealt.
deals 2 hits to an enemy with a powerful attack, penetrating his soul and his defense by 50%.
increase critical rate of the player by 15%. When an enemy is killed, grants Attack buff
sneaks behind an enemy and stabs them, dealing 5 hits. If the enemy is killed by this skill, reset its cooldown.
deals one heavy hit to an enemy, debuffs his defense.
deals one charged hit to an enemy, damage increase on target's missing hp, then heals hp according to damage dealt.
increases defense of the player by 5% every turn, up to 20%.
deals 1 hit to an enemy with all of their strength. If the enemy has a defense debuff, deals an additional 50% damage.
Deals 10 hits to all enemies with sharp feathers.
increases user’s critical damage, attack and critical rate (buff), then gives an additional turn.
increases base attack by 15%, or by 30% if a two-handed sword is equipped.
penetrates the target’s defense by 40% ; if the enemy is debuffed, has a 50% chance to play again.
increases hp by 150% of base attack. Heals 5% of damage dealt.
Inverts the current weapon’s damage type and increases it by 20%.
Increase hp and defense by 15%. After receiving damage, give a shield equivalent to 5% of max health.
increases magical damages by 50%. Every 2 turns, decreases the third skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Always take the first turn, and convert 50% of defense into attack.
heal for 10% of max health at the end of the turn. Once every 2 turns, give immunity.
If ennemy is buffed, give atk and def buff
After an enemy attack, gives a shield, the shield strength is equivalent to 20% of the damage received
Once every turn; cleanse one debuff when attacked
Heals the player by 30% when falling under 20% of max HP // One time use
increase attack by 5%.
increase defense by 5%.
increase Hp by 5%.
Increases speed by 5%
deals damage equivalent to 20% of the target’s max health. For every turn that has passed, damage increases by 5%, up to 25%.
Deals 50% of physical attack before a 80% chance to decrease the target’s defense for 2 turns. // debuff
Gives a shield equivalent to 50% of missing health for 3 turns.
Deals 25% of physical/magic att as true damage. If the player’s physical damage is higher than the enemy, remove all debuffs.
Has a 70% chance to stun for 1 turn and a 100% chance to silence for 2 turns.
deals 50% of magical attack, has a 50% chance to stun the target for 1 turn, and has a 75% chance to increase the target’s third skill cooldown by 2 turns.
Penetrate defense by 100%
heal for 30% of max health. Increase heal by 10% for each enemy still alive.
Deals damage scaling by the target’s lost health, if the target has 5% hp or lower, execute the target.
Cleanse all debuffs
Remove all buffs from target
Heals 40% of lost health
give attack buff for 3 turns
Stun the enemy for 1 turn // High CD
Increase base speed by 20%.
Give an attack buff for 2 turns before attacking an enemy
Once every 2 turns, give a barrier scaling on max Hp.
When the player receives a debuff, give random buff (att, Crit Rate, Crit Damage).
Increase Crit Rate of player by 25%.
Deal 15% of damage done to all other enemies.
Increase caster's magic attack by 20%
When the player is attacked, has a 15% chance to stun the enemy.
Gives a Crit Damage Buff for 3 turns.
Attacks all enemies, and gives a shield based off 40% of damage done.
Cleanse 1 debuff, and gives the cleansed debuff to enemy/enemies.
Gives a shield to the player, scales with max Hp
Hits the player dealing physical damage
Hits the player with magic damage
Hits the player 3 times and deal physical damage and has a 10% chance to Silence for 1 turn
Hits the player 3 times and deal magic damage and has a 10% chance to give a demonic mark
Hits the player 4 times dealing physical damage
Hits the player with huge fangs and has a 20% chance to defence break
Hits the player 3 times and increases attackbar by 25%
With the use of herbs and nature around it, restore 50% hp of the lowest health ally
Hits the player 5 times and has a 25% chance to stun
Hits the player with a huge hit, the damage is x2 and has a 10% chance to stun
The user spreads its roots across the feild reducing enemy's attackbar by 50%
Hits the player with a smoke screen dealing magic damage and has 100% chance to inflict an attack break
Clense all debuffs and heals 30% hp of all allies
User gives himself an attack buff for 3 turns
Hits the player 4 times dealing physical damage and has a 50% chance to recieve a Crit Rate and Crit Dmg buff
The user heals 20% health of all allies and gives a shield proportional to max health
Gives break attack debuff to player and gives an attack buff to user
Hits the player dealing physical damage before giving user an attack buff
Hits the player dealing magic damage and has a 10% to inflict a demonic mark
Has a 40% chance to inflict a defense break to the player
Hits the player dealing magic damage and has 100% chance to break defence and 50% chance to inflict 2 demonic marks
Hits the player dealing physical damage before inflicting a support silence debuff
Hits the player dealing physical damage, inflicting demonic mark and has 50% chance to break defense, if break defense atk bar 100%
Gives all allies a atk buff for 2 turns
Hits the player dealing physical damage and has a 20% chance to defense break

If user has an atk buff penetrate defense by 10%
If he's alone, increase his attack by 100% regen 50% of damage dealt
If the ennemy is stunned, give a break attack debuff
If you're not alone, increase all stats by 10% + 5% per enemy
If the enemy has a demonic mark, inflict 2 additionnal demonic mark

When demon mage heals allies, deal damage to the enemy according to the amount recovered
Hits an ennemy dealing physical damage and penetrating defense by 10%, and increasing atkbar by 50%

Deal physical damge to all enemies decreasing the thier atkbar by 70% and silencing them
Gives defense buff to player and a shield worth 25% of max health
Once every 3 turns, if the player has a buff, increase atkbar by 50%
When suffering an attack that would kill, leaves the player at 1 hp
If the target is debuffed after attacking, increase atkbar by 70%
When player Hp falls below 40%, give a shield worth 70% of max health and an atkbuff for 2 turns
Inflicts damage based on 25% of his defense and has a 40% chance of Taunting.
Each turn increases his defense by 2.5%.

Deal damage equal to 60% of his defense and inflicts defense break (debuff) to caster for 2 turns. Cooldown 3 turns. If battle difficulty is insane, deal damage equal to 60% of his defense and inflicts an Attack break (debuff) to caster for 2 turns.
Gain Immunity for 2 turns and Silence the Supports Characters of the enemy for 2 turns.
When Hp is lower than 30%, convert defense percentage gained by Heavenly Armor into Attack.
When Hp is lower than 30% of max health, activate Berserk, gives undispellable attack and Crit dmg buff.
Hits the player 2 times, with 50% chance each of inflicting Demonic Mark and deals Physical Damage. If the difficulty is on Insane, has 100% chance each of inflicting Demonic Mark

Attacks the player with a 50% chance to stun dealing 70% of attack as physical damage, if the player is stunned after attack, inflict 2 Demonic Mark. If the player is not stunned after the attack, inflict a defense break (debuff) to the user.
Inflicts Demonic Mark at the end of every turn.

If the player has 6 or more Demonic Marks, Consumes all Demonic Marks on the player and inflicts a defense break (debuff) before dealing 50% of attack as physical damage. Has a 50% (100% on insane) chance to attack again for each Demonic Marks, each hit deals damage equivalent to 25% of the boss's Attack as Magical Damages. After attacking, inflict an attack (debuff).
If the user has a debuff before attacking, strip the player of all buffs.
Deal physical damage to player and if player has a buff, has 50% chance to steal a buff.
Takes 20% less damage from critical hits. Does 20% more damage to non-buffed enemies.
Gives himself defense and attack buffs for 2 turns.
Everytime the user(Betala) receives a buff, adds one buff mark. Once the number of buff marks reaches 5, If the user has a buff, deals magic damage equivalent to 70% of attack for each buff active.
Before attacking, if the user(Betala) has a debuff, and the player has a buff, inflict a support silence(debuff) to the player and give immunity to the user(Betala).
